name: HexChat
description: HexChat is a chat tool based on XChat that supports various network connection modes. It can automatically connect, join the channel and generate ID with spelling check and DCC file transfer supported.

en_US.description: HexChat is a chat tool based on XChat that supports various network connection modes. It can automatically connect, join the channel and generate ID with spelling check and DCC file transfer supported.
en_US.name: HexChat

zh_CN.description: HexChat是基于XChat的一款聊天工具，支持多种网络连接模式，可以自动连接、自动加入频道和自动生成ID，支持拼写检查和DCC文件传输等。
zh_CN.name: HexChat
